45959.summary: Some customers who have activated new Shaw Internet services, or have made a change to their Shaw Internet package, may experience slow internet speeds or the inability to access the internet for up to 2 hours from time the change was made. We are working to resolve this as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
